metadata.description: Official Bright Data plugin for Claude Code - Web scraping, search, and structured data extraction

plugins.name: brightdata-plugin
plugins.description: Web scraping, Google search, and structured data extraction powered by Bright Data APIs. Includes 3 skills: scrape any webpage as markdown (with bot detection/CAPTCHA bypass), search Google with structured JSON results, and extract data from 40+ websites (Amazon, LinkedIn, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and more).
